budget_planning_desc: Plan your future and stay on track with your spending.
no_active_budgets_desc: Don't have a plan yet? Use our Auto-Setup to generate a recommended budget instantly based on your income.
no_budgets_desc: You haven't set any budgets for this month. Start by creating your first budget.
estimated_income_desc: We will automatically allocate this income across various categories.
financial_goal_desc: Choose a strategy that best fits your priorities this month.
aggressive_saving_desc: Reduce non-essential spending for maximum savings. Ideal for building assets or clearing debt.
balanced_lifestyle_desc: Balanced allocation for needs, wants, and savings (50/30/20 Rule).
commuter_desc: Frequent travel or office work. Higher priority for transportation budget.
homebody_desc: Spend more time at home. Reduced transport budget, increased utilities/comfort budget.
standard_desc: Balanced activities without priorities in specific areas.
categories_desc: Manage your income and expense categories
delete_category_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete ":name"?
reason_saving_aggressive: Increased allocation for rapid emergency fund building.
reason_transport_commuter: Allocation for fuel/public transport due to high mobility.
reason_utilities: Power, Water, Internet, and data plans.
reason_entertainment: Entertainment to stay productive and avoid burnout.
reason_groceries: Kitchen needs and house cleaning supplies.
reason_general: General allocation based on your profile.
insight_inflation_message: You spent :amount on :category this month, which is :percentage% higher than your 3-month average.
insight_burn_rate_message: At your current daily spending rate, you are projected to spend :amount by month-end, exceeding your income.
insight_pacing_message: You are on track to spend :amount, which is close to your total income.
insight_weekend_message: About :percentage% of your spending happens on weekends. Consider a specific weekend budget.
insight_latte_message: You've made :count small transactions (< :amount) this month. These add up quick! Watch out for 'leakage'.
insight_savings_message: Great job! You are saving :rate% of your income, which is a healthy financial habit.
tip_emergency_critical_message: You have less than 1 month of expenses saved (:months months). Prioritize building an emergency fund immediately.
tip_emergency_warning_message: You have :months months of runway. Aim for at least 3 months to be secure against unexpected events.
tip_emergency_success_message: You have :months months of expenses covered. Consider investing the excess to beat inflation.
tip_squeeze_message: Cutting your :category spending by just 10% would save you :amount this month.
tip_savings_message: Your savings rate is :rate%. Try setting up an auto-transfer of 10% to savings as soon as you receive income.
try_different_search: Try a different search or adjust your filters
deactivate_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to deactivate this wallet? It won't appear in selection lists.
activate_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to activate this wallet?
name: Name
let_ai_calculate: Let AI calculate optimal allocations based on your income and lifestyle.
activity_description: Tell us about your daily routines so we can adjust allocations for transport or food more accurately.
lifestyle_commuter_desc: You travel frequently for work or social life. We'll allocate a higher transport budget.
lifestyle_homebody_desc: You spend most of your time at home. We'll focus the budget on groceries and utilities.
lifestyle_standard_desc: A standard mix of activities with no specific budget focus.
estimated_income_description: Let us know your estimated monthly income to better allocate your budget.
financial_goal_description: Choose the strategy that best fits your current financial objectives.
goal_aggressive_desc: Focus on maximum wealth growth by strictly limiting non-essential spending.
goal_balanced_desc: A sustainable mix of saving and enjoyment for long-term financial health.
no_analysis_desc: Income and expenses charts will appear here once you start recording transactions.
no_data_available_desc: We can't show your expense categories yet.
mission_accomplished_desc: You've explored every corner of VibeFinance. You are now equipped to master your money. Happy vibing!
pro_upgrade_welcome: Welcome to the elite club, :name! Your financial journey just got a massive upgrade.
verify_email_desc: Please verify your email address to secure your account and access all premium features.
tour_welcome_desc: Let's get you started on your journey to financial freedom. This quick tour will help you set up and understand your new dashboard.
tour_metrics_desc: This is where you see the big picture. All your vital financial stats are aggregated here for quick monitoring.
tour_wallets_desc: Since you're new, let's start by creating your first Wallet. This is where you track your bank accounts, cash, or e-wallets.
tour_pulse_desc: Now that you have data, these cards show your Total Balance, Monthly Income, and Expenses at a glance.
tour_charts_desc: See the big picture of your finances over time. This chart compares your Income vs Expenses to show your yearly progress.
tour_breakdown_desc: Identify your top spending categories instantly. This helps you see where most of your money goes for better optimization.
tour_activity_desc: Keep track of every cent moving in and out here. Precision is the key to clarity.
tour_analysis_desc: Ready to see the patterns? Click on Analysis to explore your spending trends and smart insights.
tour_transactions_desc: All your financial activity lives here. Let's check out your Transactions.
tour_budget_desc: Setting limits is key. Let's manage your Budget.
tour_goals_desc: What are you saving for? Let's check your Goals.
tour_categories_desc: Organize your spending. Let's manage your Categories.
tour_tracker_desc: Monitor growth. Let's visit the Net Worth Tracker.
tour_reports_desc: High-level insights. Let's look at your Reports.
insight_marketing_pro_text: Unlock AI recommendations and unlimited wallets.
insight_marketing_master_text: Save 17% and get priority support + verified badge.
insight_marketing_lifetime_text: Unlock permanent access to all existing and future features.
insight_marketing_founder_text: Enjoy early access to all future updates permanently.
insight_marketing_default_text: Keep your financial goals on track with a premium plan.
manage_and_monitor: Manage and monitor your cash flow
unlock_unlimited_categories: Unlock unlimited categories to organize your expenses exactly the way you want with the Professional Plan.
tour_tx_add_desc: Let's record your first movement. Add an income or expense here to see your charts and reports come to life!
tour_tx_list_desc: Your activity is now recorded. This data is what powers your Smart Insights and Wealth Tracker.
tour_tx_full_picture_desc: Let's head back to the Dashboard to see how this transaction updated your wealth overview.
tour_wallet_first_desc: Every financial journey starts here. Add your first wallet right now to represent your cash, bank account, or e-wallet. This is the foundation of your dashboard!
tour_wallet_success_desc: You've created your first wallet. Now, every time you spend or receive money, you can track it here. Let's see where you'll record your activity next.
tour_return_hub_desc: Almost there! One final module to explore. Let's head back to the Dashboard to wrap up.
tour_record_activity_desc: Perfect. Now let's learn how to record your spending in Transactions.
wallet_limit_desc: Manage your finances more freely with the Professional Plan. Add unlimited wallets and bank accounts.
analysis_desc: Deep dive into your spending and income trends
inc_data_appear: Income data will appear here once you record earnings.
cant_show_expense: We can't show your expense path yet.
record_tx_see_breakdown: Record transactions to see your spending distribution and breakdown categories.
smart_insights_appear: Smart insights will appear here once we detect spending habits.
tips_generated: Financial tips and tricks will be generated as you track more data.
get_ai_analysis: Get AI-powered analysis of your spending habits and anomaly detection.
unlock_advice: Unlock personalized financial advice, emergency runway calculations, and category squeezing tips.
tour_analysis_summary_desc: This area summarizes your overall health. We track your Savings Rate, Surplus, and Efficiency in real-time.
tour_income_flow_desc: Track your daily earnings trend. Understanding your inflow peaks helps you plan for better saving opportunities.
tour_expense_path_desc: A daily view of your spending. Spot unusual spikes or consistent outflows to tighten your financial control.
footer_tagline: Manage your finances with clarity, peace, and full control.
tour_spending_mix_desc: See where your money *actually* goes. This breakdown helps you identify which categories are eating up your budget.
tour_smart_insights_desc: Our AI analyzes your spending patterns and gives you actionable advice on how to optimize your lifestyle and save more.
tour_return_hub_desc_mobile: Ready for more? Let's head back to the Dashboard to continue our journey.
tour_budget_control_desc: Analysis complete. Now let's learn how to set limits and stick to them in the Budget module.
tour_budget_summary_desc: See at a glance how much you've spent and what's remaining for the month. Your Daily Allowance helps you pace your spending.
tour_budget_manual_desc: Create individual limits for each category to keep your spending in check.
tour_budget_auto_desc: Don't want to do it manually? Let our AI suggest a balanced budget based on your income and life goals.
tour_budget_return_desc: Budgeting is just the start. Let's see how it funds your life dreams. Let's head back to the Dashboard to continue our journey.
tour_budget_goals_desc: Great. Now let's learn how to track your savings for what matters most in Goals.
unlock_ai_recommendations_desc: Get personalized budget limits based on your actual spending history and saving goals.
testimonials_subtitle: Trusted by high-achievers to manage their wealth with precision and style.
testimonial_1_quote: VibeFinance completely changed how I look at my business expenses. The multi-currency support is a lifesaver for my international clients!
testimonial_2_quote: Finally a finance app that doesn't look like a spreadsheet from the 90s. The glassmorphism UI is stunning and actually fun to use.
testimonial_3_quote: The AI insights are surprisingly accurate. It caught a recurring subscription I'd forgotten about within the first week of use.
testimonial_4_quote: I recommend VibeFinance to my clients for its clarity. It's the most sophisticated yet simple tool for personal wealth tracking I've found.
upsell_auto_setup_desc: Unlock the full potential of AI-powered budgeting with the Professional Plan. Save more and spend smarter.
upsell_ai_recs_desc: Unlock personalized budget limits and AI-powered saving tips based on your actual spending patterns with the Professional Plan. Save more and spend smarter.
upsell_category_limit_desc: Unlock unlimited categories to organize your expenses exactly the way you want with the Professional Plan.
based_on_avg_spending: Based on your avg spending of :amount in the last 3 months.
goals_desc: Plan your future and track your milestones.
start_planning: Start planning your dreams. Create your first financial goal to see your progress here.
tour_goal_summary_desc: Get an overview of your total targets, amounts saved, and overall progress towards your financial dreams.
tour_add_goal_desc: Ready for something new? Use this button to set up a new financial target, whether it's for an emergency fund, travel, or retirement.
tour_goals_section_desc: Your goals turn abstract dreams into concrete targets. Track your progress and celebrate every milestone.
tour_return_categories_desc: Structure is key to achievement. Let's set up your spending Categories.
upsell_goals_desc: Focusing on one goal is great, but managing multiple dreams is even better. Upgrade to Professional to add unlimited goals.
system_category_lock_msg: System categories cannot be modified or deleted.
tour_personalize_categories_desc: Create custom categories to match your unique spending and income patterns.
tour_income_expense_desc: Switch between your spending categories and income sources to organize both sides of your balance sheet.
tour_category_system_desc: Organize your finances into meaningful buckets. The better your categories, the clearer your analysis will be.
tour_wealth_map_desc: Insights and planning are done. Now let's look at your long-term growth in the Tracker.
tour_return_dashboard_desc: Ready to see your wealth grow? Let's head back to the Dashboard to continue our journey.
tracker_desc: Monitor your asset growth month over month.
unlock_history_desc: View your detailed financial history beyond 3 months and master your long-term growth with the Professional Plan.
professional_history_desc: Upgrade to see your full financial history and growth patterns.
no_tracking_desc: Monitor your asset growth over time. Start adding transactions or manage your wallets to see your history here.
tour_tracker_range_desc: Use this selector to choose the period you want to track. Monitor your progress over 3 months, 6 months, or even your entire history!
tour_tracker_total_desc: This is the "Big Number". It represents your total wealth aggregated from all your active balances across all periods.
tour_tracker_matrix_desc: This detailed table shows your net worth transformation. We track how much you save and how it accumulates month-over-month.
tour_tracker_mobile_list_desc: Below, you can see how each of your assets has performed and grown over time.
tour_return_reports_desc: Finally, let's see how to generate professional summaries in Reports.
professional_mutation_desc: Upgrade to Professional to see individual transaction details, categories, and running balance history.
no_statement_desc: We couldn't find any financial records for this period. Try selecting another month or adding your first wallet.
tour_report_filters_desc: Filter your reports by date, category, or wallet to zero in on the data that matters most.
tour_report_export_desc: Ready for accounting or tax season? Export your clean, professional data to PDF or Excel with a single click.
tour_reports_card_desc: This is where you see the "Story" of your money. Click to expand any wallet and see every single income and expense recorded in this period.
tour_victory_lap_desc: You've completed the grand tour. Let's head back to the Dashboard for a small celebration!
upsell_historical_statement_desc: Upgrade to Professional to access your older financial statements and detailed historical records.
upsell_professional_exports_desc: Unlock PDF exports for formal documentation and professional record-keeping with the Professional Plan.
upsell_data_interoperability_desc: Unlock Excel exports to analyze your financial data and account mutations in your favorite spreadsheet software.
upsell_transaction_ledger_desc: Unlock the detailed transaction history and mutation reports with the Professional Plan. Audit your finances like a pro.
clear_all_data_text: Are you sure you want to delete all transactions? This cannot be undone.
portfolio_cleared: Your financial portfolio has been cleared.
delete_account_text: This will permanently delete your account and all your data.
verification_failed: Verification failed. Input master key incorrectly.
privacy_intro_text: Welcome to VibeFinance ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice or our practices with regard to your personal information, please contact us at info@terasweb.id.
privacy_collect_text: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us.
privacy_collect_list_1: Personal Info: Name, email address, and password (stored in an encrypted format, we do not know your actual password).
privacy_collect_list_2: Financial Data: Transaction records, budget goals, and wallet balances that you manually input.
privacy_collect_list_3: Usage Data: Information about how you use our website.
privacy_use_text: We use personal information collected via our Services for a variety of business purposes described below:
privacy_use_list_1: To facilitate account creation and logon process.
privacy_use_list_2: To send you marketing and promotional communications.
privacy_use_list_3: To send administrative information to you.
privacy_security_text: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, please also remember that we cannot guarantee that the internet itself is 100% secure.
privacy_contact_text: If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may email us at info@terasweb.id.
terms_agreement_text: These Terms of Use constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity (‚Äúyou‚Äù) and VibeFinance (‚ÄúCompany,‚Äù ‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúus,‚Äù or ‚Äúour‚Äù), concerning your access to and use of the VibeFinance website as well as any other media form, media channel, mobile website or mobile application related, linked, or otherwise connected thereto (collectively, the ‚ÄúSite‚Äù).
terms_desc_text: VibeFinance provides a platform for users to manually track their personal finances, budgets, and financial goals. We do not provide financial advice, and our services are for informational and organizational purposes only.
terms_user_text: By using the Site, you represent and warrant that:
terms_user_list_1: All registration information you submit will be true, accurate, current, and complete.
terms_user_list_2: You will maintain the accuracy of such information and promptly update such registration information as necessary.
terms_user_list_3: You have the legal capacity and you agree to comply with these Terms of Use.
terms_user_list_4: You are not a minor in the jurisdiction in which you reside.
terms_prohibited_text: You may not access or use the Site for any purpose other than that for which we make the Site available. The Site may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors except those that are specifically endorsed or approved by us.
terms_contact_text: In order to resolve a complaint regarding the Site or to receive further information regarding use of the Site, please contact us at info@terasweb.id.
cookies_what_text: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device by websites that you visit. They are widely used in order to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.
cookies_how_text: We use cookies for the following purposes:
cookies_how_list_1: Essential Cookies: strictly necessary to provide you with services available through our website and to use some of its features, such as access to secure areas (e.g., keeping you logged in).
cookies_how_list_2: Functionality Cookies: used to recognize you when you return to our website (e.g., remembering your language preference of EN/ID).
cookies_how_list_3: Analytics Cookies: used to understand how visitors interact with the website, helping us improve the user experience.
cookies_manage_text: Most web browsers allow some control of most cookies through the browser settings. To find out more about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set, visit www.aboutcookies.org or www.allaboutcookies.org.
cookies_contact_text: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please email us at info@terasweb.id.
